title.narrative: Gambie - Projet d'éducation de base (Education III)

description.narrative: The project specific objectives are to increase access to quality education and skills development of the poor, particularly girls in the remote regions of The Gambia.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
